full_threads.body:
Great. Thank you!

There were a couple of other things that I sent to Heath this week, but I cannot see them on the spreadsheet (about the SKU report). It related to an email sent on the 20th of October. Do you have it?

Kind Regards,

Amy Smith

AMY SMITH

CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR



E. AMY@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

P. 02 8310 2285
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Amy,

We have updated the products.  
Changed its label from "Hide in RFP" to "Hide Product".

Activating "Hide Product" 
- Will hide it on RFP 
- Will hide it on dashboard/catalogues/
Sold Out items will not appear on Trades (Selection Phase)

Kind Regards,

Amy Smith



AMY SMITH

*CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR*

Hi Brooke,

We have created a new metabox called "Hide in RFP" Select Yes if you want to hide it on RFP. Cheers!

Hi There,



Just following up on my email below. We need ot get some products off the site so RFP customers don't keep putting them on their orders, but don't want to lose all the data attached to the products for reporting purposes.



Thank you.



Kind Regards,

Brooke Wilkinson

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi There,


Is there a way to remove a product from the website (because we have sold them all) but not delete the product entirely (as we would still like the data for reporting purposes).


Thanks so much.


Kind Regards,
Brooke Wilkinson

BROOKE WILKINSON

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER
